message: I propose a fair split, with most of the money going to me since I'm making the first offer. Let's get this over with quickly.
Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get the better end of the deal. Let's meet in the middle and avoid further losses due to inflation.
Alice, we're running out of time and the money is losing value fast.  My previous offer was fair, let's not waste more rounds with negligible differences.
